name: EM310-TILT
description: EM310-TILT is a LoRaWANÂ® tilt sensor mainly for angle measurement and asset movement detection. With a compact size and 3-axis accelerometer, EM310-TILT can be installed to the objects easily to measure its X, Y, Z tilt angles. It can also detect the movement based on angle changes and send threshold alarms
author: Akenza AG
